title: 日本淺草觀音寺一百籤第十三籤
poem: 手把大陽輝,東君發舊枝,稼苗方欲秀,猶更上雲梯

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是：擁抱光明與不斷奮進，期待豐盛成長。"手把大陽輝"描繪了一種把握陽光、把握機遇的姿態；"東君發舊枝"則象徵春風拂過，老枝再度綻放；"稼苗方欲秀"說明稻穀正處於生長的關鍵期，暗示事業或生活正處於萌芽階段；"猶更上雲梯"提醒人們雖然已取得成就，仍需不斷攀升，追求更高目標。整首詩以自然景象為隱喻，勉勵讀者持續努力、積極向上，終將收穫豐盈。
analysis.en: This poem’s theme is about embracing the light and persisting in effort toward abundant growth. "Holding the great sun" depicts seizing the brightness and opportunities; "The eastern lord sprouts old branches" symbolizes the spring wind reviving old branches; "Seedlings just want to show" indicates crops in a critical growth stage, hinting at life or career at a budding point; "Still climbing higher to the cloud ladder" reminds readers that even after achievements, continued ascent toward higher goals is needed. The poem uses natural imagery as metaphor to encourage persistent effort and upward striving, ultimately leading to prosperity.
analysis.jp: この詩のテーマは、光を抱き、努力を続けて豊かな成長を目指すことです。『手把大陽輝』は光を掴み、機会を掴む姿勢を描写しています。『東君発舊枝』は春風が古い枝を再び咲かせる象徴です。『稼苗方欲秀』は稲が成長の重要な段階にあることを示し、人生や仕事が芽生える段階にあることを示唆しています。『猶更上雲梯』は達成した後も更に高い目標へと上昇し続けることを思い出させます。自然のイメージを比喩として使い、継続的な努力と上向きの姿勢を励まし、最終的に豊かな成果へと導きます。

rag_analysis: According to the poem, the core meaning is that persistent effort in the face of opportunity and growth leads to prosperity. • Symbolism: • The sun (“大陽輝”) represents opportunity and enlightenment. • The “old branches” sprouting again allude to renewal and resilience. • The seedlings in early growth (“稼苗方欲秀”) signal potential and the importance of nurturing beginnings. • The “cloud ladder” illustrates continuous striving toward higher goals. • Hidden philosophy: effort must be sustained even after initial successes; optimism, renewal, and perseverance are essential for long-term success.
